alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Columbiana; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:54PM EDT until April 05 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in east central Ohio... Northern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Columbiana County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Guernsey County in east central Ohio... Carroll County in east central Ohio... Eastern Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... Western Beaver County in western Pennsylvania... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lawrence County in western Pennsylvania... Brooke County in northern West Virginia... Hancock County in northern West Virginia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Dennison, or 10 miles east of Uhrichsville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, New Philadelphia, Salem, East Liverpool, Columbiana, Uhrichsville, East Palestine, Wellsville, Cadiz, Carrollton, and Freeport. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 91 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Columbiana; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas
